Rewards Rate: 2 RPs for Every Rs 100 Spent on UPI. 1 RP for Each Rs 100 Non-UPI Transaction
Reward Redemption: 1 RP = Rs 0.35. RPs Can Also Be Redeemed on Indus Moments

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver (Rs. 40 Monthly & Rs. 480 Annually)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Total Transaction Amount or Rs. 300 Minimum

product_details: Earn 2 RPs on Rs. 100 Spent on UPI Transactions
Earn 1 RP on Rs. 100 Spent on Non-UPI Transactions
